verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}This is my commandment, that you love One another that your joy may be full. This is my commandment, that you love One another that your joy may be full.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}That your joy may be full. That your joy may be full. This is my commandment, that you love One another that your joy may be full.{/lang-eng}
